snippet: Peyton Manning and Tom Brady will renew their storied rivalry in Sunday's AFC title game but the clash will be unlike any other as it may be the last between two of the National Football League's greatest quarterbacks....
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning and Tom Brady will renew their storied rivalry in Sunday's AFC title game but the clash will be unlike any other as it may be the last between two of the National Football League's greatest quarterbacks.

headline.main: Manning and Rival Brady to Battle for Super Bowl Berth
headline.print_headline: Manning and Rival Brady to Battle for Super Bowl Berth
